Name: Inventor Gadgets
Script: Before Start Turn: self.setvar(~phillip~|false); trace(e.skills); // for(myskill in e.skills) { if(myskill.name == ~Emulator~) { self.setvar(~emulatorchange~|e.skills.indexOf(myskill)); } if(self.getvar(~emulatorchange~) != null) {  }

Name: Starspear
Script: On Execute: attack(6); var randstatus = rand([BLIND|CURSE|LOCK|FIRE|ICE|WEAKEN|SHOCK|POISON]); inflict(randstatus|2); sfxdamage(target|d); sfx(~_~ + randstatus.toLowerCase()|~~|0.2);
